name: Run Turn Die
description: Your heart racing. Your fingers tense. Your mind empty of thoughts. All that exists, is the path in front of you. You sit on the edge of the chair. Will you make it this time?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is great! It starts off with some easy puzzles, but it starts getting difficult enough to keep you intrigued without having you rage quit. I really love this game! 100% buy, especially for this price!
